summary: A bidet is a plumbing fixture used for personal hygiene, designed to wash your private areas and bottom after using the toilet. It looks like a small sink and has a water supply and drain. Bidets are popular in some European and Asian countries, where they're often required in bathrooms. People also use them for other purposes like washing feet or bathing babies. The word "bidet" comes from French, meaning "pony," because of the way you straddle it.
title: Bidet
